title: NFL ATL: Week 8 preview, TNF recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 8 preview, TNF recap
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling gear up to give you a full Week 8 preview and break down the top games to watch. The crew also recaps all of the action from NFL Network’s “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the Carolina Panthers and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. Don’t miss the latest controversy over Wesseling’s toaster. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
